description: Jessy owns a small urban farm with 10 unused plots. She can lease some/all plots to Bob, an aspiring gardener, who will cultivate them with organic vegetables. Cultivated plots yield three times their market value. Bob then decides how much of the profit to share with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: lease all plots to the gardener

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: return 0 profit to the farm owner
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of the profits to the farm owner
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of the profits to the farm owner
